title: m4nki
author: m4nki
content: We're looking for a Discord manager to run a blockchain club. Please reach out to us if you think you'd be a great fit for this role.Thank you!

comments.author: Luxury6
comments.body: I've managed few projects in the past and I'm confident i perfectly fits in for the role. I'd to have an interview where i can show my skills.

comments.author: Timmex01
comments.body: I was thrilled to see an opening for the role of an discord manager for a blockchain club, and with my 3 years of experience in growing communities and promoting projects that exceed clientsâ€™ expectations, I believe I would be a great fit for this role.

comments.author: Review Master
comments.body: Quote from: m4nki on June 28, 2022, 01:22:50 PMWe're looking for a Discord manager to run a blockchain club. Please reach out to us if you think you'd be a great fit for this role.Thank you!Kindly check your dm as i'm willing to be the discord manager for your projects.
